summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Promotion Page feature. Backend: 16/16 tests passed. Frontend: All UI elements working correctly - member dropdown, Discord roles API, nickname management, role checkboxes with colors, and navigation link in Admin menu.
passed_tests: Backend: Admin login successful
Backend: GET /api/discord/roles returns list of 33 Discord roles
Backend: Discord roles have correct structure (id, name, color, position, permissions)
Backend: GET /api/discord/roles without auth returns 401/403
Backend: GET /api/discord/member/{id}/roles returns member's current Discord roles
Backend: Member Discord info includes nickname (NPrez Q-Ball for Q-Ball)
Backend: Member Discord info includes discord_id
Backend: GET /api/discord/member/nonexistent returns 404
Backend: GET /api/discord/member/{id}/roles without auth returns 401/403
Backend: GET /api/members returns list of 44 members
Backend: Q-Ball is in members list with correct ID
Backend: POST /api/discord/member/{id}/roles endpoint works (update roles)
Backend: POST /api/discord/member/nonexistent/roles returns 404
Backend: POST /api/discord/member/{id}/roles without auth returns 401/403
Backend: POST /api/discord/member/{id}/nickname endpoint works
Backend: POST /api/discord/member/nonexistent/nickname returns 404
Backend: POST /api/discord/member/{id}/nickname without auth returns 401/403
Frontend: Promotion Page loads at /promotions
Frontend: Page title 'Member Promotion' displayed
Frontend: 'Select Member' card with dropdown visible
Frontend: Member dropdown shows all members (Q-Ball, Lonestar, etc.)
Frontend: Selecting Q-Ball loads their Discord info
Frontend: Discord Nickname section visible with input showing 'NPrez Q-Ball'
Frontend: Update Nickname button present and functional
Frontend: Discord Roles section visible
Frontend: Current Roles displayed as colored badges (Unhinged, Voting, Members, Chapter Prez, Club Officer, National Budget Committee, Admins)
Frontend: 33 role checkboxes displayed with color indicators
Frontend: Update Discord Roles button present
Frontend: Back to Dashboard button present
Frontend: Promotions link appears in Admin menu
Frontend: Navigation from Admin menu to /promotions works
critical_code_review_comments: Discord bot must be running for role fetching to work - this is a real Discord API integration, not mocked
Role updates and nickname changes are applied directly to Discord server
seed_data_creation: None - used existing production data. Q-Ball is linked to Discord with ID 291308425759948800.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Promotion Page feature is fully functional. Backend endpoints: GET /api/discord/roles (all server roles), GET /api/discord/member/{id}/roles (member's current roles), POST /api/discord/member/{id}/roles (update roles), POST /api/discord/member/{id}/nickname (update nickname). Frontend page at /promotions with member dropdown, nickname input, role checkboxes with colors. Navigation link in Admin menu under 'Promotions'. Discord bot must be running for all features to work. Test user Q-Ball has 7 Discord roles including Admins, Chapter Prez, Members.
